verbose_text: Expression of Cx46 T19M or overexpression of wild-type Cx46 in the presence of endogenous Cx46 had little effect on CSC proliferation (XREF_FIG; XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY), apoptosis (XREF_FIG and XREF_FIG), or self-renewal (XREF_FIG and XREF_FIG), a hallmark of the CSC state, which was assessed by limiting dilution sphere formation analysis, while we observed small but signifi-cant decreases in proliferation and self-renewal with expression of Cx46 L11S.
